get.description: Provides a list of locations

parameters.name: coordinates

schema.description: WGS 84 Coordinate pair in form latitude,longitude. Supports up to 4 decimal points of precision, additional decimal precision will be truncated in the query e.g. 38.9074,-77.0373
schema.title: Coordinates

parameters.description: WGS 84 Coordinate pair in form latitude,longitude. Supports up to 4 decimal points of precision, additional decimal precision will be truncated in the query e.g. 38.9074,-77.0373

parameters.name: radius

schema.description: Search radius from coordinates as center in meters. Maximum of 25,000 (25km) defaults to 1000 (1km) e.g. radius=1000
schema.title: Radius

parameters.description: Search radius from coordinates as center in meters. Maximum of 25,000 (25km) defaults to 1000 (1km) e.g. radius=1000

schema.description: Limit the results to a specific provider or multiple providers  with a single provider ID or a comma delimited list of IDs
schema.title: Providers Id

parameters.description: Limit the results to a specific provider or multiple providers  with a single provider ID or a comma delimited list of IDs

schema.description: geospatial bounding box of Min X, min Y, max X, max Y in WGS 84 coordinates. Up to 4 decimal points of precision, addtional decimal precision will be truncated to 4 decimal points precision e.g. -77.037,38.907,-77.0,39.910
